pr_title: Fix bugs and improve default fallback logic of Apache Dubbo adapter

timeline.message:
Add RuntimeException converting method in BlockException and polish logic for validation

Signed-off-by: Eric Zhao <sczyh16@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Maybe the priority list is throwable -> r.exception indicating throwable is more fatal. How do you think about it?
timeline.author: jasonjoo2010

timeline.message:
Fix NPE bug and improve default fallback in Dubbo 2.7.x adapter

- Fix NPE bug in consumer filter (when non-biz error occurred)
- Improve default fallback in Dubbo 2.7.x adapter: convert the BlockException to a simple RuntimeException (with necessary message)
- Polish code and comments

Signed-off-by: Eric Zhao <sczyh16@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: It's better to set error outside the loop because there are always more than one elements in stack.
timeline.author: jasonjoo2010
